channel.title: Help me please
channel.description:
[center]I need some help so read below o find out what i need help with
Ok just type the number of what u wish to help me with in ur post then next to the number right what u have to say. [b]DO NOT FLAME OR SPAM!![/b] 1. ON testscae there is a stat glitch. like for example... lets say im 74 str then i level to 75. it will say 74/75 untill i log out.. while on other servs it wud be 75/75. How do i make so i dont have to log out when i level up?
2. Making a command looks lik its so easy yet i dont get it. ppl tell me the format but i dont know were to place it. If someone could maby tell me where and how to put a command in then it would help a lot.
3. how and were do i add global objects. (dont say fedexers guide because i dont understand it).[/center][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 11:00:50 AM[/size][hr]no one wants to help??

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @pacman89012 pacman89012
item.description:
@pacman89012 wrote:

[center]I need some help so read below o find out what i need help with

Ok just type the number of what u wish to help me with in ur post then next to the number right what u have to say.
DO NOT FLAME OR SPAM!!

  1. ON testscae there is a stat glitch. like for example… lets say im 74 str then i level to 75. it will say 74/75 untill i log out… while on other servs it wud be 75/75. How do i make so i dont have to log out when i level up?

  2. Making a command looks lik its so easy yet i dont get it. ppl tell me the format but i dont know were to place it. If someone could maby tell me where and how to put a command in then it would help a lot.

  3. how and were do i add global objects. (dont say fedexers guide because i dont understand it).[/center][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 11:00:50 AM[/size][hr]no one wants to help??
